StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetO.cerWaiverHistoryForNwa]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaID int)
AS
SELECT ow.[OFFICER_WAIVER_ID] AS [O.cerWaiverId] ,ow.[NWA_ID] AS [NwaId] ,ow.[WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE] AS [DateSubmited] ,owc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC AS [Category] ,owt.WAIVER_TYPE_SHORT_DESC AS [Type] ,ws.[WAIVER_STATUS_DESC] AS [Status] ,owt.WAIVER_LEVEL AS [FinalLevel] ,ow.CURRENT_WAIVER_LEVEL AS [CurrentLevel] ,owt.WAIVER_CODE AS [Code] FROM [dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER] ow WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_TYPE] owt ON owt.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = ow.WAIVER_TYPE_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[OFFICER_WAIVER_CATEGORY] owc ON owc.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = owt.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN [dbo].[WAIVER_STATUS] ws ON ws.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = ow.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE WHERE [NWA_ID] = @NwaID
